name: ACTOR
documentation: Ancestor of all real-world types, including people and organisations. An actor is any real-world entity capable of taking on a role.

languages.name: languages
languages.documentation: Languages which can be used to communicate with this actor, in preferred order of use (if known, else order irrelevant).

roles.name: roles
roles.documentation: Identifiers of the Version container for each Role played by this Party.
